nodes.name: Extract Check-in/Check-out Dates

nodes.text:
I'd be happy to check room availability for you! Please provide:

📅 Check-in date (YYYY-MM-DD)
📅 Check-out date (YYYY-MM-DD)
👥 Number of guests

Example: "Check availability from 2024-03-15 to 2024-03-18 for 2 guests"

nodes.name: Call CloudBeds API
Format Availability Response

nodes.text: Thank you for checking availability with us! Is there anything else I can help you with?
